item.title: Contact
item.description: If you want to drop me a line please us this form..

item.title: Hello World
item.description: #The blog is live ! More to come in the near future. I am testing this new platform called Hugo to publish a static site. The workflow is very interesting and it applies a series of templates and rules to a markdown file. It’s definitely something new that I have never tried before but I am willing to put time and effort to learn this new platform. Github offers an amazing integration that allow you to host a static site for freeform one of your repository, more to come.
